thread.title: STX and National Collegiate Hockey Conference Extend Partnership, Announce Ticket Promotions
thread.title_full: STX and National Collegiate Hockey Conference Extend Partnership, Announce Ticket Promotions - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: STX and National Collegiate Hockey Conference Extend Partnership, Announce Ticket Promotions
text:
Ticket Giveaway Encourages College Hockey Fans to Spend “Saturdays with STX”
Baltimore, MD (PRWEB) October 14, 2015
Baltimore-based STX, LLC, a global sporting goods leader, today announced the extension of its partnership with the National Collegiate Hockey Conference (NCHC) for the 2015-16 season. The partnership will include ticket giveaways at each NCHC-member venue and a grand prize VIP trip to the 2016 NCHC Frozen Faceoff championship tournament.
“The NCHC is the premier college hockey conference in North America. We’re extremely proud of our partnership and excited to offer college hockey fans from around the country the opportunity to spend a Saturday evening taking in the game at the highest collegiate level,” said Matt Hoppe, Senior Global Brand Manager at STX.
The expanded partnership provides STX a branding presence throughout NCHCHockey.com, on NCHC.tv and at the 2016 Frozen Faceoff. This is the second year STX has partnered with the NCHC.
”We are excited to continue this great partnership with STX Hockey. We look forward to providing great fan experiences throughout year at our member institutions’ venues with the help of STX,” said Josh Fenton, Commissioner of the NCHC
The “Saturdays with STX” contest provides ticket giveaways to eight regular season Saturday night games for all of the member schools. Participants will also be entered to win the grand prize, a VIP trip to the 2016 NCHC Frozen Faceoff championship tournament in Minneapolis.
The grand prize package includes four tickets to the Frozen Faceoff, two nights hotel accommodation, a VIP experience at the tournament and custom Frozen Faceoff apparel. The first ticket giveaway will be for the Saturday, October 24 game with Boston College at Colorado College.
For a chance to spend “Saturdays with STX,” hockey fans are encouraged to follow STX Hockey and the NCHC on Twitter and submit a photo of themselves showing their NCHC team pride.
For complete contest rules and details, please visit stx.com/hockey.
About STX:
STX is a global sporting goods leader in the sports of lacrosse, field hockey and ice hockey. With its 1970 introduction of the first synthetic lacrosse head, STX ushered in the “modern era” of what is now the fastest growing team sport. Based in Baltimore, the home of lacrosse, STX has been universally recognized for innovation in product design and development. STX continues to strive for new performance standards in sporting goods equipment at the highest levels of competition. For more information, visit http://www.stx.com .
About NCHC:
The National Collegiate Hockey Conference is an eight-school, NCAA Division I men’s hockey conference entering its third season of competition. The NCHC’s member institutions are: Colorado College, the University of Denver, Miami University, the University of Minnesota Duluth, the University of Nebraska Omaha, the University of North Dakota, St. Cloud State University and Western Michigan University. Since 2000, NCHC’s members have produced four NCAA Champions and 20 NCAA Frozen Four appearances, including three in the last two seasons. All eight members have participated in the NCAA Ice Hockey Championship tournament at least once since 2011, including an NCAA-record six of eight teams in 2015. For more information, visit http://www.nchchockey.com .
